name: Dungeon Grinder
description:
A basic test-run of a combat system for an upcoming project of mine, testing out the limitations and the minimum requirements for a player and an enemy.

A proof of concept basically, Right click to move (hold to follow the mouse) right click on enemies to attack them, 1-3 on the numpad to switch between playable characters currently in game, Q and E to switch projectiles/weapons (the melee character only has the one weapon).
